text: Mud is a 2012 American drama movie directed by Jeff Nichols. It is Nichols first movie that he ever directed. It stars Matthew McConaughey, Tye Sheridan, Sam Shepard, and Reese Witherspoon. The movie is set in Arkansas. It was released for a limited time on April 26, 2013 and later on May 10, 2013. It received very positive reviews. It currently has a 98% on Rotten Tomatoes. title: Mud (movie)
